trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i possibili allineamenti con cui gli elementi di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> possono essere visualizzati.

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of ToolStripLayoutStyle with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile controllare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>layout scegliendo uno dei membri di ToolStripLayoutStyle con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Layout di stack sovrapposizione è la disposizione degli elementi adiacenti a entrambe le estremità di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: Nell'elenco seguente vengono descritti i layout di stack.

trans-unit.source: - StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: -StackWithOverflow è il valore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Questa impostazione determina il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>per modificare il layout automaticamente in base al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>proprietà per gestire il trascinamento e scenari di ancoraggio.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: -Esegue il rendering VerticalStackWithOverflow il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>elementi accanto a altro in senso verticale.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: -Esegue il rendering HorizontalStackWithOverflow il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>elementi accanto a altro in senso orizzontale.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: Altre funzionalità di layout di Stack <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>determina la fine di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>a cui l'elemento viene allineato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando gli elementi non corrispondono all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, viene automaticamente visualizzato un pulsante di overflow.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>impostazione della proprietà determina se un elemento deve essere visualizzato nell'area di riversamento, in base alle esigenze, o.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>proprietà per determinare se un elemento è stato collocato nella classe principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, l'overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, o se non viene visualizzato affatto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Le cause comuni per cui non viene visualizzato un elemento sono che l'elemento non è contenuto il principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Rendere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>mobile inserendolo in una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>e l'impostazione relativa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A>al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: Altre opzioni di Layout, le altre opzioni di layout sono di flusso e la tabella.

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Layout di flusso di Layout di flusso è il valore predefinito per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È simile a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Le funzionalità di layout di flusso sono i seguenti:-tutte le funzionalità di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>esposte dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: È necessario eseguire il cast della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>classe per una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: -È possibile usare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>proprietà nel codice per allineare gli elementi all'interno della riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>proprietà viene ignorata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -In di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>proprietà per determinare se un elemento è stato collocato nella classe principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>o dimensioni eccessive.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: -Il riquadro non viene eseguito e pertanto un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>nello stile di layout di flusso in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>non può essere spostato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>pulsante di overflow non viene eseguito, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>viene ignorato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Table Layout Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Layout di tabella Layout di tabella è il valore predefinito per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È simile a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Le funzionalità di layout di tabella sono i seguenti:-tutte le funzionalità di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>esposte dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: È necessario eseguire il cast della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>classe per una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: -È possibile usare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>proprietà nel codice per allineare gli elementi all'interno della cella di tabella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>proprietà viene ignorata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -In di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>proprietà per determinare se un elemento è stato collocato nella classe principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>o dimensioni eccessive.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: -Il riquadro non viene eseguito e pertanto un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>nello stile di layout di tabella in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>non può essere spostato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>pulsante di overflow non viene eseguito, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>viene ignorato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il flusso degli elementi orizzontalmente o verticalmente in base alle esigenze.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi vengono disposti in orizzontale e di overflow in base alle esigenze.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi sono disposti automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi vengono disposti a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi sono disposti verticalmente, sono centrati all'interno del controllo e di overflow in base alle esigenze.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
